settings.description_1: Rare, authentic taste of Taiwanese Sausage made fresh in Canada. Loved by whole family. Now delivered to your door. 444
settings.description_2: Taiwan sausage was created before the Southern and Northern Dynasties. The "enema method" used in the "Qi Min Yaoshu" of the Northern Wei Dynasty was first seen and has been passed down to this day. 777
settings.rtb_2: MADE IN CANADA IN SMALL BATCHE 2S

settings.rtb_1_text: Easy to cook…. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
settings.rtb_2_text: Our sausages are made in a very clean and professional state-of-the-art facility, entire processing facility temperature is keep at 10 degree C or below at all time, so the produce stays fresh
settings.rtb_3_text: Pure meat, no trim or starch added, we use Picnic (considered as more expensive pork part)
settings.rtb_4_text: Our sausage has been approved and used by over 70% of Taiwanese restaurants in Vancouver
settings.rtb_5_text: Serving Greater Vancouver area for more then 10 years with proven quality and authentic taste produce
settings.rtb_6_text: Since our sausage required to be frozen, we take out preservatives like Potassium Sorbate to make it healthier
